name: read_file
description: Read contents of a file from the sandbox directory

path.description: File path to read (must be in sandbox/)

error_hints.FileNotFoundError: File doesn't exist. Check the path or use list_dir to see available files.
error_hints.PermissionError: No read permission for this file.
error_hints.IsADirectoryError: Path points to a directory. Use list_dir instead.
